ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. I do disagree with getting into storage rooms and stuff without letting me respond, but I guess I gave Ryo permission for more than I had realized. But,

Hmm.. I do disagree with getting into storage rooms and stuff without 
letting me respond, but I guess I gave Ryo permission for more than I 
had realized.

But, Ryo, ?1 would not have access to stuff at the Cybertronian Fire. 
Not even Iron Raptor does. Kluster and his crew are the only ones who 
have codes and so forth.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Alright, you work in the Cybertronian Fire.  Big whoop.  Nevermind 
defenses 
> then.  But you have to state what you do on the Ark so I can be 
sure, as well 
> as everyone else since the Ark involves EVERYONE, is to make sure 
you're 
> repairing it without moding)
